plot: The story of how a Spanish town with barely a hundred thousand of inhabitants imposed itself over the petrol industry and became one of the most influent cities of the world.
title: La fiebre del oro verde
plot_es: The story of how a Spanish town with barely a hundred thousand of inhabitants imposed itself over the petrol industry and became one of the most influent cities of the world.
plot_en: The story of how a Spanish town with barely a hundred thousand of inhabitants imposed itself over the petrol industry and became one of the most influent cities of the world.
